# Module: tf.app





Generic entry point script.

## Modules

[`flags`](../tf/app/flags) module: Import router for absl.flags. See https://github.com/abseil/abseil-py.

## Functions

[`run(...)`](../tf/app/run): Runs the program with an optional 'main' function and 'argv' list.
